post:
**Dabuu Networks introduces our OVZ LEB/LET exclusive VPS discount!**


Hello from Dan - Managing Officer at Dabuu Networks! Launched in 2013 after 4 years managing networks in europe (both remote and in house), our HQ is currently in Austria, with plans to soon move to a shared office in the UK, at one of the datacentres I work at (one which is soon being offered as one of our locations).


LowEndBox and LowEndTalk users are now getting an exclusive permanent 20% off our VPS Level 1 - so now just $5.58/m!...


This offer is exclusive to LET and will be here permanently! Other forums may only have short-term offers, which are not always in action.


**Node Specs: E3-1240v3, Samsung Enterprise SSD's in RAID 1, Multiple Gbit Ports, Ashburn - Virginia DC, 99.9% Uptime Guarantee, Daily Offsite Backups, CentOS, Debian, Fedora, Ubuntu, SUSE, Scientific Linux+**

We allow: Legal Seedbox, VPN, Benchmark/Dev, Tun/Tap...

But Not: Illegal Material, SPAM, Network Abuse, Adult Content...


_**-- Level 1**_

**Guaranteed RAM:** 1,024MB DDR3

**vSWAP (Extra RAM:** 512MB DDR3

**100% SSD Space:** 15GB

**Transfer:** 150GB @ 1,000Mbit

**IP Space:** 1 Free IPv4 Address, $1.49 Additional

**Processor:** 1 vCPU @ 3.40GHz


**_Now just $5.58/month with exclusive order link!_**



**[You can click here to order VPS Level 1 - Custom Link!](https://www.dabuu.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=28)**



Find more [here](http://www.dabuu.com/vpshosting.php), or [email us](mailto:sales@dabuu.com) for a custom quote!


**Test IP: 192.198.204.230**

**10MB Test - http://www.dabuu.com/10mb.test**

**100MB Test - http://www.dabuu.com/100mb.test**

**Sales: sales@dabuu.com**

**Support: support@dabuu.com**


_Questions?_

**Just ask!**

**If you use us... please, leave us feedback!** :)
